comments.author: Kare @ Kitchen Treaty
comments.content: Tomatoes are so glorious right now! I gave up on growing them in my own garden when June in Seattle was so atrocious. But I've been visiting a couple of farmstands in Snohomish to get my fill. I've yet to try heirloom tomatoes with stone fruit, but this looks fabulous. Must give it a try.

comments.author: Marina@Picnic at Marina
comments.content:
I could live on this salad, day in and day out! Really, tomatoes are my favorite food!
Or yes, I am definitely moving back to Seattle, in 9 months now! :) 
That is one beautiful photo, great lightning, how did you do it?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hey Marina - I use studio lights (from Alien Bees). I believe this photo was setup with a big softbox behind the salad and a simple reflector filling from the front right, and maybe a bounce card in the front left.
